item.dc:creator: @davidi2 Davidi2
item.description:
@davidi2 wrote:

[quote=“xx matty xx, post:6, topic:399376”][quote author=Davidi2 link=topic=496511.msg3630323#msg3630323 date=1308164973]
If you left, it’s no longer your property.
[/quote]How do you define ‘leaving’? Are we allowed to have more than one property? Do we have to actively maintain properties to claim ownership? If so, how often?[/quote]Well with the new plugin it will be a lot simpler, but I mean abandoned, as in you have no plan to actively live there.

Read full topic

item.dc:creator: @badger41 badger41
item.description:
@badger41 wrote:

Kittari:

hey! I didn’t destroy everything. When I got there, there were just a lot of broken walls and floating blocks… And one of those watch towers was gone too. I just broke whatever building had been heavily griefed (I would have simply fixed said heavily griefed buildings, but it was impossible to make out how they originally looked). I thought it was abandoned (seeing the crappy condition of everything but a few structures and the wall). How was I supposed to know it wasn’t really abandoned?

I support this statement, if something is already griefed beyond recognition and no report and such has been posted on it, it should be assumed that the structure has been abandoned and given to whoever wants to do with it as they wsh.

Read full topic
